attributes.action: Allow immigration on the understanding that it is for a period of 3 years only and that they will be immediately repatriated if they are convicted of committing a criminal offence.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
1. Limited period of residency in the UK ie 3years which can be extended in unusual circumstances.
2. Immediate repatriation to their country of origin, after serving their sentence, if convicted of a 'serious' criminal offence.
